title: Ticket #6927: Python Bindings: QueryOpts enum should include the clusterad flag
description:
The QueryOpts enum only includes a small subset of the possible options; for now, we should make sure it includes the one used to fetch clusterads. This will let users fetch clusterads via Schedd.query.

In future, we may change how this argument to Schedd.query works to make this kind of change unnecessary.
remarks:
2019-Mar-26 13:47:26 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looks good.

Doc Review

Is there a good reason not to tell people about the new value in the enum?

2019-Feb-21 15:00   Check-in [56229]: minor fix for python bindings. #6927 added IncludeClusterAd to the QueryOpts enum used when querying jobs from the schedd. (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
